post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Our client, Ministry of Environment, located in Toronto has an upcoming project for two (2) Programmer Analysts with experience as described in the attached documents. If you are available and interested in these roles, please respond to this email with
- your resume attached in .doc format and
- answers to ALL questions shown in the body of this email.

If this opportunity is of interest to you, please respond by submitting your resume. For immediate consideration, please respond to me now!

If you are not avaialable now, please feel free to forward this email to your friends.

Thank you,
Chris


Chris
HR Consultant
RecruiterSquad
Tel: 416.767.4333
Website: www.recruitersquad.com
post.title: Two (2) Java Developers - Contract Opportunity - RFS...2009-60
